title: MixCloud to RSS converter
author: Andrew Weeks
description: Get an RSS feed for your (or anyone else's) Mixcloud mixes and podcasts. Just paste in the MixCloud account URL or name you want and get an RSS URL in return.
rssDescription: Visit %user's profile on MixCloud. Listen to their recent and most popular Cloudcasts. It's free and really easy to use. MixCloud to RSS converter hacked together by Andrew Weeks. http://meloncholy.com
